doc:
Joseph Buloff https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Buloff 0 Joseph Buloff (December 6, 1899 – February 27, 1985) was a Lithuanian-born American actor and director known for his work in Broadway and Yiddish theatre.Some of Buloff's papers are preserved at YIVO and at the New York Public Library for the Performing Arts. Joseph_Buloff ( December_6_,_1899 – February_27_,_1985 ) was a_Lithuanian-born_American_actor_and_director known for his_work in Broadway and Yiddish_theatre.Some of Buloff 's_papers are_preserved at YIVO and at the_New_York_Public_Library for the_Performing_Arts .
